xt:extension.xt:author: Oxygen XML Editor
xt:extension.xt:name: WorkspaceAccess

div.p: This plugin installs access to the <oXygen/> workspace. That enables <oXygen/> to open/save/close resources, access the editors content, etc. Such a plugin must implement an WorkspacePluginExtension.
